com.marshalchen.common.ui

类 ProgressWheel

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • com.marshalchen.common.ui.ProgressWheel
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class ProgressWheel
extends android.view.View
    An indicator of progress, similar to Android's ProgressBar. Can be used in 'spin mode' or 'increment mode'

    • 嵌套类概要

      • onSizeChanged

        protected void onSizeChanged(int w,
                 int h,
                 int oldw,
                 int oldh)
        Use onSizeChanged instead of onAttachedToWindow to get the dimensions of the view, because this method is called after measuring the dimensions of MATCH_PARENT & WRAP_CONTENT. Use this dimensions to setup the bounds and paints.
        覆盖:
        onSizeChanged 在类中 android.view.View
